headline: Synchrony Financial’s Q3 Earnings Call: Our Top 5 Analyst Questions
summary: Synchrony Financial’s third quarter results showed steady performance, with revenue coming in flat year over year and exceeding Wall Street’s expectations. Management pointed to continued strength in credit performance and the impact of selective credit actions, which helped drive a 2% increase in purchase volume across the company’s five sales platforms. CEO Brian Doubles highlighted that “trends across our five platforms improved even as the effects of our previous credit actions continue to i
